A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I absolutely loved The Last Jedi. I've never been so enraptured by a film's storyline - from the tiniest nuances to the overarching themes - and it did it in a way that visually stunning\, emotionally complex\, and just...ridiculously cool. I loved The Force Awakens\, but The Last Jedi completely elevated these films for me in a whole new way. I'm really excited about it where they go from here.
